description.de-DE: Saisons versorgen dich das ganze Jahr über mit neuen Inhalten und neuen Spielmöglichkeiten für MyTEAM. Hier und jetzt erfährst du alles über die neuesten Saison-Updates!
description.en-US: Seasons will bring new content and new ways to play MyTEAM all year long. Learn all about the latest Season updates right here, right now!
description.es-419: Las temporadas traerán nuevo contenido y nuevas formas de jugar a MyTEAM durante todo el año. ¡Entérate de las últimas novedades de las temporadas, aquí y ahora!
description.es-ES: Las Temporadas traerán nuevo contenido y nuevas formas de jugar a MyTEAM durante todo el año. ¡Entérate de las últimas novedades de las Temporadas, aquí y ahora!
description.fr-FR: Les saisons vous proposeront de nouveaux contenus et de nouvelles façons de jouer à MyTEAM tout au long de l'année. Découvrez tout ce qu'il y a à savoir sur les dernières mises à jour des saisons maintenant !
description.it-IT: Le Stagioni porteranno nuovi contenuti e nuovi modi di giocare a La mia SQUADRA per tutto l'anno. Scopri le ultimissime notizie sulle Stagioni, qui e subito!
description.ja-JP: 「シーズン」の導入により、1年を通じて新たな形でのマイチームのプレイが可能になります。さらに、新コンテンツも続々と追加されます！ 今すぐシーズンの最新アップデートの内容をチェックしましょう！
description.ko-KR: 시즌으로 일 년 내내 새로운 콘텐츠와 새로운 MyTEAM 플레이 방식을 즐겨 보세요. 지금 바로 여기서 최신 시즌 업데이트 내용을 전부 확인할 수 있습니다!
description.nl-NL: Seasons geeft je het hele jaar lang nieuwe content en manieren om MyTEAM te spelen. Kom hier meteen meer te weten over de nieuwste Season-updates!
description.pt-BR: As Temporadas trazem novos conteúdos e formas de se jogar o MyTEAM ao longo do ano. Saiba mais sobre todas as novidades da Temporada aqui e agora!
description.zh-CN: 梦幻球队在整年中每季都会带来全新内容和全新玩法。现在就了解最新一季更新的全部内容！
description.zh-Hant-TW: 在一整年裡，賽季將為MyTEAM帶來新內容和新玩法。現在一起來瞧瞧最新一季帶來了哪些更新內容！

content.value: New Hunt 4 Glory: Camouflage Packs are live! Pick up these new defenders for your squad today: Galaxy Opal Dennis Rodman, Pink Diamond John Havlicek, Diamond Tony Allen, Amethyst Kirk Hinrich, and Ruby Donte DiVincenzo. Available for one week.

name.en-US: W22 | News Article #3 | Launch  - Compose: SEO

description.en-US: The Official WWE 2K22 Feature Announcement is here. Experience a redesigned gameplay engine, all-new game modes and stunning graphics.

content.value: is returning soon and in spectacular fashion with the next installment of the franchise:

. Showcasing a plethora of enhancements to the gameplay engine, stunning visual effects, and intuitive controls, we hope you’re ready! These are just a few of the features awaiting you in the ring, as well as all-new game modes MyGM and MyFACTION. Punch, kick, and slam your way to WWE Superstardom, then claim your place in history next to legendary luchador Rey Mysterio.

Celebrating 20 years of his WWE career, Mysterio strikes fear into his foes with his iconic mask and punishes them with high flying offense and his “619” signature move. In celebration of his awe-inspiring career, the San Diego native will grace the cover of
, capturing the essence and flair of the in-game action.
“Representing the culture of lucha libre as the cover Superstar for

is a moment of great pride for me,” said Mysterio. “I’m looking forward to sharing the stories behind the big moments of my career with a dedicated community of players and connecting with WWE fans in a whole new way as they play through my 2K
Embark on an eventful career or develop and build an iconic faction of your very own. Get ready, because

The WWE has seen many stars ascend from humble beginnings to achieve elite status. Your journey to greatness won’t be easy, but in MyRISE, you’ll chart your own path to WWE stardom by taking on anyone who stands in your way. You can choose to play one of two unique stories for female and male Superstars. MyRISE features an exhilarating storyline unique to this mode and pits you against some of the biggest names in the industry. If you dream of being the best, you’ll need to prove you have what it takes in the ring.
EXPERIMENT WITH THE UPGRADED CREATION SUITE AND UNIVERSE MODE

Every WWE Superstar and Legend has a persona that sets them apart from the rest. What will yours be? This year, the Creation Suite receives a full revamp, letting you customize your experience down to the smallest detail. Head into Universe mode to create your own narrative and control events, brands, rivalries, and even tinker with match results. Manage personas, venues, and championship bouts, and then—in an exciting first for the series—share your creations cross-platform with the
TAKE THE REINS WITH MyGM MODE

Have you ever wondered what a day in the life of a WWE General Manager is like? In MyGM, you get to be just that,  calling the shots for one of sports entertainment’s biggest brands. You’ll be tasked with drafting a roster of the WWE’s greatest stars, deciding who will clash in rivalry matches and fight for glory in a championship showdown. Building the WWE’s brand and promoting generational talent falls on your shoulders. Are you up for the challenge

The Corporation, nWo, and Evolution are just a few of the most decorated factions in WWE history. Whether you loved them or despised them, their iconic legacy in sports entertainment is undeniable. Factions can change the face of the industry and it’s up to you to assemble the next all-star squad. In the all-new MyFACTION mode, collect and manage a dream faction of Superstars and compete in weekly events. Packed with thrilling challenges and immense replay value, MyFACTION delivers a hard-hitting adventure and consistent updates to keep things feeling fresh.
will be available for you to choose from:
Standard Edition, Cross-Gen Digital Bundle, Deluxe Edition,
and a special tribute to the 25th anniversary of nWo in the form of the
. Each edition comes equipped with all the aforementioned game modes and experiences, but extra content may vary:
will be available for $59.99 on previous-gen platforms (PlayStation® 4, Xbox One consoles and PC)
and for $69.99 on current-gen consoles (PlayStation® 5 and Xbox Series X|S) in both physical and digital formats.
will be available for $79.99 and includes the digital
across previous and current-gen within the same PlayStation and Xbox consoles
will be available for $99.99 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S in both physical and digital formats, and on PC in digital format. The
a Season Pass to all five post-launch DLC content packs; the
content** (included in-box for physical copies only). The
is available three days early on March 8, 2022; Players who purchase the PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S edition will also receive the

will be available for $119.99 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC in digital format. Celebrating 25 years of the faction that turned the sports entertainment world on its head, in addition to the
and all bonus content included in the

comes with MyFACTION EVO Cards and alternate nWo attires for Hollywood Hogan, Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and Syxx plus a playable Eric Bischoff character, WCW Souled Out 1997 and WCW Bash at the Beach 1996 arenas, and the nWo Wolfpac Championship.
is available three days early on March 8.

, which includes three additional Undertaker personas, MyFACTION EVO cards for Undertaker, plus MyFACTION Perks and Bonuses, including an Undertaker MyFACTION Logo Card, Undertaker MyFACTION Wallpaper Card, and Undertaker MyFACTION Nameplate Card***. This pack is also included in the
is set to release on March 11, 2022, so make sure to pre-order your copy now! Until then, be sure to check back for more news and updates on the
, where you can find more information and details regarding the WWE franchise.

name.en-US: W22 | News Article #3 | Launch  - WWE Generic Spoke (Article) Page
W22 | News #2 | Features & Innovations - Compose: SEO

description.en-US: Here comes the BOOM! WWE 2K is back and bringing the biggest Superstars, signature moves, and theatrics the game has ever seen in WWE 2K22. Set to make its grand entrance in March 2022!

title.en-US: WWE 2K22 UNVEILS HIT LIST OF FEATURES AND INNOVATIONS

content.value: is back and bringing the biggest Superstars, signature moves, and theatrics the game has ever seen in
. Set to make its grand entrance in March 2022,
boasts stunning graphics, a redesigned gameplay engine, and the return of some fan-favorite game modes! 2K and Visual Concepts recently unveiled the Hit List for
, revealing the most anticipated innovations you can look forward to in the latest edition of the

is about looking and feeling like a true WWE superstar. From experiencing the roar of the crowd to delivering a punishing powerbomb, the fully redesigned gameplay engine brings all aspects of WWE action to life. When you step into the ring, the gameplay will seriously hit different, with every dive, kick out, and finishing move feeling as if it's happening right in your living room.

In addition to the revamped gameplay engine, new controls have been implemented to ensure a seamless and intuitive experience for any skill level, while still allowing for highly skilled players to showcase unique moves. The redesigned gameplay engine is responsive and configured to give you limitless combos, counters, and finishing moves right at your fingertips.
To complement the tight controls, WWE 2K22 gets in your face with lifelike graphics that make you feel like you've got a ringside seat.

is sure to blow you away with its stunning visuals and state-of-the-art lighting, making you shine bigger and brighter in front of thousands of adoring fans. Whether you’re competing in WrestleMania, SummerSlam, or the Royal Rumble,
will feel like a title match every time you walk down the ramp.

When the game releases in March, you’ll be able to experience the new controls, gameplay, and graphics for yourself, plus new and returning game modes, like MyGM, MyFACTION, MyRISE, Universe Mode, and Creation Suite.
MyGM is making its debut in the

franchise. Take the reins as a WWE General Manager and draft your very own roster of WWE Superstars, managing contracts and booking matches of all varieties to prove that you’ve got what it takes to build and run the best show in sports entertainment.

Also making its WWE 2K debut, introducing—drum roll, please—the new, the intimidating, the unstoppable, whatever you decide to make it, MyFACTION. This all-new game mode allows players to get creative by building and taking control of a faction of their own. D-Generation X, New World Order, and The Corporation are just a few of the iconic factions assembled through the years, and now it’s your turn to create the next legendary team. Collect, manage, and upgrade WWE Superstars and make your faction the greatest partnership in WWE history.

Every WWE Superstar has to start somewhere and climb the ranks before commanding the spotlight, and that’s exactly what you’ll do in MyRISE. Start from the bottom as a wide-eyed Rookie eager to make an impact in the ring and make the right connections behind-the-scenes. String together wins to earn more notoriety and claim your place in history as a WWE Superstar, becoming the main attraction. Live out your dreams as a hero in the eyes of fans all over the world, or play the role of a villain thwarting the plans of anyone foolish enough to stand in your way. All-new storylines are available for both male and female MyPLAYERS looking to rise from Rookie to Legend.
There’s a lot that goes on within the WWE Universe, and you can take full control of the action in Universe Mode, returning in

. Run the WWE however you want by pitting wrestlers against one another to form rivalries, decide PPV matches, and control brands more than ever before. Let loose in Universe Mode or in the Creation Suite, where you can unleash your creativity by designing an all-new identity that you can then showcase in the ring. Both modes offer free rein and allow you to experiment with new ideas.

hits different, and we can’t wait for you to experience it when it hits shelves in March next year. This is just a taste of what you can expect, but stay tuned for more as additional details will be provided in January 2022. Until then, check out more videos and news on our YouTube page,

to be the first to know about future updates.

content.value: تتضمن الحزمة الرقمية Cross-Gen لـWWE 2K22 استحقاقًا ثنائي الجيل للإصدار الرقمي القياسي بالإضافة إلى حزمة Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio التي تضم بطاقةStarrcade ’96 Rey Mysterio وبطاقة الياقوت الأحمر الخاصة بـStarrcade ‘96 MyFACTION القابلة للعب.

Mit dem WWE 2K22 Cross-Gen Digital Bundle kann die Digital Standard Edition auf zwei Konsolengenerationen gespielt werden. Außerdem enthält es das Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio-Pack mit einer spielbaren Starrcade '96-Version von Rey Mysterio und die dazugehörige Starrcade '96 Meine FRAKTION-Rubin-Karte.

The WWE 2K22 Cross-Gen Digital Bundle includes dual-gen entitlement to the Digital Standard Edition as well as the Starrcade ’96 Rey Mysterio Pack featuring a playable Starrcade ’96 Rey Mysterio and Starrcade ’96 Ruby MyFACTION card.

El lote digital Cross-Gen de WWE 2K22 permite jugar en Dual-Gen a la Digital Standard Edition e incluye el pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996, que presenta una versión jugable de Starrcade 1996 para Rey Mysterio y su correspondiente carta Rubí de MyFACTION.

El lote digital Cross-Gen de WWE 2K22 permite jugar en Dual-Gen a la Edición Estándar Digital e incluye el pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996, que presenta una versión jugable de Starrcade 1996 para Rey Mysterio y su correspondiente carta Rubí de Mi FACCIÓN.

Le Bundle numérique Cross-Gen WWE 2K22 inclut un accès dual-gen à l'édition numérique Standard ainsi qu'au Pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 comprenant une version jouable de Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 et une carte Rubis Starrcade '96 Ma FACTION correspondante.

Il Bundle digitale cross-gen WWE 2K22 include l'accesso dual-gen a WWE 2K22 Digital Standard Edition e il pacchetto Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96, contenente una versione controllabile di Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 e la carta La mia FAZIONE Starrcade '96 Rubino.
『WWE 2K22』両世代機対応 デジタルバンドルには『WWE 2K22』現世代機用と次世代機用両方のデジタル版スタンダード エディションに加えて、プレイアブルなレイ・ミステリオの Starrcade '96 バージョンと MyFACTION ルビーカードが入手可能な Starrcade '96 レイ・ミステリオ パックが収録されています。
WWE 2K22 크로스 젠 디지털 번들에는 디지털 스탠다드 에디션의 듀얼 젠 혜택과 함께, 스타케이드 ’96 레이 미스테리오, 스타케이드 ’96 레이 미스테리오 루비 MyFACTION 카드가 포함된 스타케이드 ’96 레이 미스테리오 팩이 들어 있습니다.

De WWE 2K22 Cross-Gen Digital Bundle bevat rechten voor twee generaties consoles voor de Digital Standard Edition en het Starrcade ’96 Rey Mysterio-pack met een speelbare Starrcade ’96 Rey Mysterio en Starrcade ’96 Ruby MyFACTION-kaart.

O Pacote Digital Multigeração WWE 2K22 garante acesso as versões das duas gerações de consoles da Standard Edition, além do Digital Pacote Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio, com uma versão jogável do Rey Mysterio do Starrcade '96 e a carta MyFACTION Ruby Starrcade '96.
《WWE 2K22》跨世代数字版同捆包包含数字标准版的双世代权利，以及 Starrcade '96 神秘人雷尔卡包，内含可供游玩的 Starrcade '96 神秘人雷尔和 Starrcade '96 红宝石 MyFACTION 卡片。
《WWE 2K22》跨世代數位同捆包含了可在雙世代主機上遊玩的數位標準版，以及帶來可遊玩的Starrcade '96版本Rey Mysterio和Starrcade '96紅寶石MyFACTION卡的Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio包。
بادر بالطلب المسبق للحزمة الرقمية Cross-Gen واحصل على 3 شخصيات Undertaker إضافية وبطاقات MyFACTION EVO من Undertaker امتيازات ومكافآت MyFACTION.
Bestelle das Cross-Gen Digital Bundle vor und hol dir drei zusätzliche Undertaker-Inkarnationen, Meine FRAKTION-EVO-Karten für den Undertaker sowie Meine FRAKTION-Vorteile und -Boni.
Pre-order the Cross-Gen Digital Bundle and get 3 additional Undertaker personas, MyFACTION EVO cards for Undertaker, plus MyFACTION Perks and Bonuses.
Reserva el lote digital Cross-Gen y conseguirás tres personalidades adicionales de The Undertaker, cartas EVO de The Undertaker para MyFACTION y, además, ventajas y bonificaciones para MyFACTION.
Reserva el lote digital Cross-Gen y conseguirás tres personalidades adicionales de The Undertaker, cartas EVO de The Undertaker para Mi FACCIÓN y, además, ventajas y bonificaciones para Mi FACCIÓN.
Précommandez le bundle Cross-Gen numérique et obtenez 3 personnages The Undertaker supplémentaires, des cartes EVO Ma FACTION pour The Undertaker, ainsi que des avantages et des bonus Ma FACTION.
Prenota il Bundle digitale cross-gen per ottenere 3 versioni aggiuntive di The Undertaker, carte EVO La mia FAZIONE di The Undertaker e vantaggi e bonus per La mia FAZIONE.
『WWE 2K22』両世代機対応 デジタルバンドルを予約して、3種類の追加ジ・アンダーテイカ―、ジ・アンダーテイカ―のMyFACTION進化カード、MyFACTIONの特典とボーナスを入手。
크로스 젠 디지털 번들을 예약 구매하고 3개의 추가 언더테이커 페르소나, 언더테이커 MyFACTION 진화 카드, MyFACTION 특전 및 보너스를 받으세요.
Pre-order de Cross-Gen Digital Bundle en krijg 3 extra Undertaker-persona's, MyFACTION EVO-kaarten voor Undertaker, plus MyFACTION-perks en -bonussen.
Reserve o Pacote Digital Multigeração e receba 3 personalidades adicionais do Undertaker, cartas MyFACTION EVO para o Undertaker e vantagens e bônus do MyFACTION.
预购跨世代数字同捆包，即可获得三个额外的送葬者角色、送葬者 MyFACTION EVO 卡片外加 MyFACTION 福利和奖励。
預購跨世代數位同捆可獲得3個額外Undertaker角色、Undertaker的MyFACTION進化卡，外加MyFACTION技能和獎勵。

featuresHeading.ja-JP: 両世代機対応 デジタルバンドルの収録内容
featuresHeading.zh-CN: 跨世代数字版同捆包包含

content.value: ** PS4: وحدة تحكم PS5 مطلوبة لتشغيل إصدار PS5. XB1: وحدة تحكم Xbox Series X|S مطلوبة لاسترداد إصدار Xbox Series X|S واستخدامه. XBX: وحدة تحكم Xbox One مطلوبة لاسترداد إصدار Xbox One واستخدامه.

*Vorbestellerbonus für das Undertaker Immortal-Pack gilt bis 11.03.2022. Für digitale Vorbestellungen sind die Inhalte automatisch verfügbar. Physische Vorbestellungen enthalten einen Code in der Packung, mit dem die Inhalte im Spiel abgerufen werden können. Es gelten Bedingungen. Das Undertaker Immortal-Pack ist in der WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition und der WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition enthalten.

**PS4: Zum Spielen der PS5-Version wird eine PS5-Konsole benötigt. XB1: Zum Einlösen und Spielen der Xbox Series X|S-Version wird eine Xbox Series X|S-Konsole benötigt. XBX: Zum Einlösen und Spielen der Xbox One-Version wird eine Xbox One-Konsole benötigt.

*Pre-order bonus offer available through 3/10/22. Offer is for Undertaker Immortal Pack. For digital pre-orders, items will be automatically entitled.  Undertaker Immortal Pack is included in the Deluxe Edition & nWo 4-Life Edition.
**PS4: PS5 console required to play PS5 version. PS5: PS4 console required to play PS4 version.
XB1: Xbox Series X|S console required to redeem and use Xbox Series X|S version. XBX: Xbox One console required to redeem and use Xbox One version.

*Oferta de reserva disponible hasta el 11/03/2022. Oferta aplicable al pack Undertaker Inmortal. En el caso de las reservas digitales, el contenido estará incluido automáticamente. Se aplican términos. El pack Undertaker Inmortal se incluye en las versiones WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition y WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

**PS4: Se requiere consola PS5 para jugar a la versión de PS5. Xbox One: Se requiere consola Xbox Series X|S para canjear y usar la versión de Xbox Series X|S. Xbox Series X|S: Se requiere consola Xbox One para canjear y usar la versión de Xbox One.

*Oferta de reserva disponible hasta el 11/03/2022. Oferta aplicable al pack Undertaker Inmortal. En el caso de las reservas digitales, el contenido estará incluido automáticamente. Se aplican términos. El pack Undertaker Inmortal se incluye en las versiones WWE 2K22 Edición Deluxe y WWE 2K22 Edición nWo 4-Life.

**PS4: Se requiere consola PS5 para jugar a la versión de PS5. Xbox One: Se requiere consola Xbox Series X|S para canjear y usar la versión de Xbox Series X|S. Xbox Series X|S: Se requiere consola Xbox One para canjear y usar la versión de Xbox One.

*Offre de bonus de précommande disponible jusqu'au 11/03/22. L'offre est pour le Pack Immortel The Undertaker. Pour les précommandes numériques, vous aurez automatiquement accès au contenu Des conditions s'appliquent. Le Pack Immortel The Undertaker est inclus dans WWE 2K22 Édition Deluxe & WWE 2K22 Édition nWo 4-Life.

**PS4 : la console PS5 requiert de jouer à la version PS5. XB1 : la console Xbox Series X|S requiert d'obtenir et d'utiliser la version Xbox Series X|S.X XBX : la console Xbox One requiert d'obtenir et d'utiliser la version Xbox One.

*Offerta del bonus di prenotazione disponibile fino all'11/3/2022. Offerta valida per il pacchetto The Undertaker Immortale. Gli oggetti verranno aggiunti al gioco automaticamente per le prenotazioni digitali. Si applicano delle condizioni. Il pacchetto Undertaker Immortale è incluso in WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition e WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

** PS4: console PS5 necessaria per giocare alla versione per PS5. Xbox One: Xbox Series X|S necessaria per riscattare e utilizzare la versione per Xbox Series X|S. Xbox Series X: Xbox One necessaria per riscattare e utilizzare la versione per Xbox One.
*予約特典の付与は2022年3月11日（金）まで。予約特典はジ・アンダーテイカ― イモータル パックです。デジタル版を予約した場合、特典は自動的にアクセス可能になります。パッケージ版を予約した場合、特典は同封されているコードを使用してゲーム内で引き換え可能です。利用規約が適用されます。
**PS4：PS5版をプレイするにはPS5本体が必要です。 Xbox One：Xbox Series X|S版を引き換えおよびプレイするにはXbox Series X|S本体が必要です。 Xbox Series X|S：Xbox One版をプレイするにはXbox One本体が必要です。

*예약 구매 보너스 상품은 2022년 3월 11일까지 구매 가능합니다. 보너스는 언더테이커 불멸자 팩입니다. 디지털 주문의 경우 아이템이 자동으로 지급됩니다. 실물 상품의 경우 박스에 동봉된 코드로 교환이 가능합니다. 이용 약관이 적용됩니다. 언더테이커 불멸자 팩은 WWE 2K22 디럭스 에디션 및 WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life 에디션에 포함되어 있습니다.
**PS4: PS5 버전을 플레이하려면 PS5 콘솔이 필요합니다. XB1: Xbox Series X|S 버전의 교환 및 사용에는 Xbox Series X|S 콘솔이 필요합니다. XBX: Xbox One 버전의 교환 및 사용에는 Xbox One 콘솔이 필요합니다.

*Pre-orderbonusaanbieding beschikbaar tot 11/3/22. De aanbieding geldt voor het Undertaker Immortal-pack. Voor digitale pre-orders worden items automatisch toegekend. Er zijn voorwaarden van toepassing. Het Undertaker Immortal-pack is inbegrepen in de WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition en WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

**PS4: PS5-console vereist om PS5-versie te spelen. XB1: Xbox Series X|S-console vereist om Xbox Series X|S-versie te verzilveren en gebruiken. XBX: Xbox One-console vereist om Xbox One-versie te verzilveren en gebruiken.

*Oferta do bônus da reserva disponível até 11/03/22. A oferta é para o Pacote Undertaker Immortal. Para reservas digitais, os itens serão atribuídos automaticamente. Os termos se aplicam. O Pacote Undertaker Immortal está incluso nas edições WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition e WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

**PS4: console PS5 necessário para jogar a versão do PS5. XB1: console Xbox Series X|S necessário para resgatar e usar a versão do Xbox Series X|S. XBX: console Xbox One necessário para resgatar e usar a versão do Xbox One.
*预购奖励优惠有效期至 2022 年 3 月 11 日。优惠适用于送葬者不朽包。对于数字版预购玩家，游戏内项目将自动发放。对于实体版预购玩家，请使用包装盒内提供的代码兑换游戏内项目。相应条款适用。《WWE 2K22》豪华版和《WWE 2K22》nWo 4-Life版皆有包含送葬者不朽包。
**PS4：需要 PS5 主机以开始 PS5 版本游戏。XB1：需要 Xbox Series X|S 主机以兑换并使用 Xbox Series X|S 版本游戏。XBX：需要 Xbox One 主机以兑换并使用 Xbox One 版本游戏。
*預購特典優惠至2022年3月11日止，優惠內容為Undertaker不朽包。預購數位版者，特典物品將自動解鎖；預購實體版者，需使用遊戲盒中的代碼到遊戲內兌換物品。需遵守適用條款。《WWE 2K22》豪華版和《WWE 2K22》nWo 4-Life版皆有包含Undertaker不朽包。
**PS4：需有PS5主機方可遊玩PS5版本。XB1：需有Xbox Series X|S主機方可兌換及遊玩Xbox Series X|S版本。XBX：需有Xbox One主機方可兌換及遊玩Xbox One版本。
اشترِ الحزمة الرقمية Cross-Gen واستلم حزمة Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio التي تشمل شخصية '96 Rey Mysterio القابلة للعب وبطاقة الياقوت الأحمر الخاصة بـStarrcade ‘96 Rey Mysterio MyFACTION.
Kaufe das Cross-Gen Digital Bundle und erhalte das Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio-Pack mit dem spielbaren Charakter '96 Rey Mysterio und der dazugehörigen Starrcade '96-Meine FRAKTION-Rubin-Karte.

(Next-Gen Only) Purchase the Cross-Gen Digital Bundle and recieve the Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio Pack featuring a '96 Rey Mysterio playable character and Starrcade ‘96 Rey Mysterio Ruby MyFACTION card.

Si adquieres el lote digital Cross-Gen, recibirás el pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996, que incluye al personaje jugable Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996 y la carta Rubí de MyFACTION de Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996.

Si adquieres el lote digital Cross-Gen, recibirás el pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996, que incluye al personaje jugable Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996 y la carta Rubí de Mi FACCIÓN de Rey Mysterio Starrcade 1996.

Achetez le bundle numérique Cross-Gen et recevez le Pack Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 , qui comprend un personnage jouable Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 et une carte rubis Ma FACTION Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96.

Acquista il Bundle digitale cross-gen per ricevere il pacchetto Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96, che include il personaggio controllabile Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 e la carta Rey Mysterio Starrcade '96 Rubino per La mia FAZIONE.
両世代機対応 デジタルバンドルでは、Starrcade '96 レイ・ミステリオのプレイアブルキャラクター、Starrcade ‘96 レイ・ミステリオの MyFACTION ルビーカードが手に入る Starrcade '96 レイ・ミステリオ パックを収録。
크로스 젠 디지털 번들을 구매하고 플레이 가능한 '96 레이 미스테리오 캐릭터 및 스타케이드 '96 레이 미스테리오 루비 MyFACTION 카드가 포함된 스타케이드 '96 레이 미스테리오 팩을 받으세요.
Koop de Cross-Gen Digital Bundle en krijg het Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio-pack met een speelbare '96-versie van Rey Mysterio en een Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio Ruby MyFACTION-kaart.

Compre o Pacote Digital Multigeração e receba o Pacote Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio, que inclui um personagem jogável Rey Mysterio do Starrcade '96 e a carta MyFACTION Ruby Rey Mysterio do Starrcade '96.

(Next-Gen Only) Purchase the Cross-Gen Digital Bundle and recieve the Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio Pack featuring a '96 Rey Mysterio playable character and Starrcade ‘96 Rey Mysterio Ruby MyFACTION card.

(Next-Gen Only) Purchase the Cross-Gen Digital Bundle and recieve the Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio Pack featuring a '96 Rey Mysterio playable character and Starrcade ‘96 Rey Mysterio Ruby MyFACTION card.
购买跨世代数字版同捆包即可获得 Starrcade '96 神秘人雷尔卡包，其中包含了可供游玩的 '96 版神秘人雷尔以及 Starrcade '96 版神秘人雷尔红宝石 MyFACTION 卡片。
購買跨世代數位同捆，取得帶來可遊玩的Starrcade '96版本Rey Mysterio和Starrcade '96紅寶石MyFACTION卡的Starrcade '96 Rey Mysterio包。
